name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Sidebar GPT-4o, Claude3, AI Video Generator & AI Tools: ChatMove

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your magical all-in-one AI content creation assistant for chrome. ChatGPT Sidebar: GPT-4o, Claude3 and 100+ AI tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Sidebar: All-in-one AI tool - ChatMove 
Access 10+ POWERFUL AI Models including an AI Video Generator like OpenAI's Sora or Google's Veo in our open source all-in-one AI Chrome Extension. 

Automate content creation tasks like writing, coding, video creation, video editing and upscaling, image creation and editing, and HUNDREDS more!

FEATURES: 

AI Models: SDXL for Image Generation, Claude3 Sonnet and Haiku, ChatGPT and more for text generation, writing, coding, and 1000s of other tasks. GPT-4 and all GPT version models (including the new free GPT-4o). Gemini and Gemini Pro coming soon. AI Video Generator integration.

AI Creation Assistant: Access AI tools for video creation & upscaling, media editing, and more in our convenient chrome extension sidebar at any time.


üü¢ Why Choose ChatMove as Your Go-To AI Extension? üü¢

2Ô∏è‚É£ User-Friendly Design: Despite its comprehensive features, Magi maintains a simple and intuitive interface.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Continuous Improvement and Privacy Friendly (Open Source): We're committed to the long haul, consistently upgrading Magi features and performance. We're also open source and will be integrating contributions from our community ideas into the app.

üü¢ Key Features That Set ChatMove Apart: üü¢

1Ô∏è‚É£ AI Chatbot Capabilities in the Side Panel: ‚úÖ Free Multi-Chatbot Support: Chat with ChatGPT 3.5, GPT-4, GPT-4o, Claude 3, Gemini 1.5 Pro, and more, all in one place. ‚úÖ AI Group Chat: Pit @ChatGPT, @Gemini, @Claude, and others against the same question, comparing their answers on the fly. 

2Ô∏è‚É£  Reading Assistance: ‚úÖ Quick Lookup: Use the context menu to quickly explain or translate words. ‚úÖ Article Summary Generator: Get the gist of articles in a snap. ‚úÖ Video Summarizer: Summarize YouTube videos without watching the entire thing. ‚úÖ Language Translator: Translate whole web pages or selected text into 50+ languages. ‚úÖ Prompt Library: Leverage saved prompts for deeper insights.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Writing Assistance: ‚úÖ Contextual Help: Get real-time writing assistance in every input box‚ÄîTwitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and more. ‚úÖ ChatMove Rewording Tool: Paraphrase your wording to improve clarity, avoid plagiarism, and more. ‚úÖ Outline Composer: Streamline your writing process with instant outlines. ‚úÖ Sentence Sculpting: Expand or condense sentences with ease. ‚úÖ Tone Twister: Switch up your writing tone on the fly.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Website Enhancements: ‚úÖ ChatMove Gmail Writing Assistant: Elevate your email game with improved language capabilities. ‚úÖ Community Expertise: Stand out on Quora and StackOverflow by answering questions with AI-assisted insights. ‚úÖ YouTube Summaries: Get the skinny on videos without the watch time.

6Ô∏è‚É£ AI Artistry: ‚úÖ ChatMove Text-to-Video like OpenAI Sora or Google Veo AI Video Generator Online ‚úÖ Text-to-Image: Convert your words into visuals. ‚úÖ Background Remover: Remove backgrounds from any image. ‚úÖ Text Remover: Extract text from your pictures. 

7Ô∏è‚É£ ChatMove Widgets: ‚úÖ AI Writer: Draft articles or respond to messages with AI-backed suggestions. ‚úÖ Grammar Checker: Improve your text for clarity, beyond just spellcheck. ‚úÖ Translation Tweaker: Customize tone, style, language complexity, and length for the perfect translation.
